title: 비유 표현 - 감정 비유
description: 감정과 느낌을 생생한 비유로 표현하는 원어민 수준의 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: It feels like my heart is being torn into a thousand pieces.
I feel like I'm walking on clouds.
It feels like there's a hole in my chest.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 감정 비유 표현 구사

sentences.kr: 마음이 천 갈래로 찢어지는 것 같아.
sentences.en: It feels like my heart is being torn into a thousand pieces.
I feel like I'm walking on clouds.
It feels like there's a hole in my chest.

sentences.kr: 마치 롤러코스터를 타는 것 같은 하루였어.
sentences.en: It was like riding a roller coaster all day.
My heart feels like a heavy stone.
I feel like I'm flying in the sky.
I'm uncomfortable, like sitting on a bed of thorns.

sentences.kr: 마음에 따뜻한 햇살이 드는 것 같아.
sentences.en: It feels like warm sunshine is entering my heart.
